channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- GigPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- GigPress

item.title: CVE-2022-4759|2024-08-03T01:48:40.413Z -- unknown -- gigpress
item.description: The GigPress WordPress plugin before 2.3.28 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks

item.title: CVE-2023-7233|2024-08-02T08:57:35.566Z -- unknown -- gigpress
item.description: The GigPress WordPress plugin through 2.3.29 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2023-7233|2024-02-12T16:07:32.182Z -- unknown -- gigpress
item.description: The GigPress WordPress plugin through 2.3.29 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
